headline: Moody’s shifts Amazon outlook to stable amid AI infrastructure spending
summary: Investing.com -- Moody’s Ratings has revised its outlook for Amazon.com Inc (NASDAQ:AMZN) to stable from positive, signaling a shift in the e-commerce giant’s credit trajectory. The credit agency simultaneously affirmed Amazon’s A1 senior unsecured rating, citing the company's dominant market position and robust brand equity. The revision follows Amazon’s strategic decision to increase capital spending by over 50% to approximately $200 billion to bolster its technology infrastructure. This massi
